I was looking back at pictures today. What happened? I used to be so cute. I used to be so happy. You could see it in my eyes, in my smile. It was straight from the heart. I'm so overwelmed. I'm so sick of myself. I've never hated anyone as much as I hate myself now. I looked in the mirror and I hate what I see. I've forgotten how to have fun. I've forgotten how to be happy. I've forgotten hot to just let go. Even at dance I don't let go anymore. I used to be the girl that eveyrone wated to be. Everyone used to be my friend. i was all the teachers favorites. guys had crushed on me. My parents trusted me and were proud of me. I was the smartest kid in the class. I was the best dancer in my class. I was the thinnest dancer in my class. what happened? Everyone else has a plan. Has a future. I don't know wat I wanna be. I don't even know wat i love to do anymore. Its pretty sad. I'm a junior in highschool and I've yet to have any purpose to my life. I have no meaning to my life nor anyone around me. Ever teacher I used to have used to say to me "you have such a bright future heather" " you will go far and do great things" I haven't heard that in a while. I feel like my whole life I've danced, yet I'm still not good enough to dance in life.  I'm never gonna be good enough to do anything with dance past highschool. And without dance I'm no one. But I can't dream for a future that I can't achieve. I used to be so sure of myself. I used to be so fun to be around. I could make anyone happy. Now I can't even make myself happy let alone anyone around me.  I hate what i've become.. I worry what others think of me.... I worry constantly that I"m dissapointing someone. I worry that I'm not thin enough or pretty enough or good enough. Sometimes I sit at lunch in just think.... "just smile Heather then they will think its all ok." And I do. ANd everyone sits there and goes on with their conversations, which is what I want. I am fine. my life is grande compared to many other ppl out there. I should be thankful for what I have. I mean.... when I think about it...... right now homecoming seems like a big deal and having a date and being seen as pretty and thin and wonderful and happy n cheerful. but.... in the big picture of things when I look back ten years later ... will that matter?  Will it matter that I think back to highschool n will have all bad memories? of no friends or bf's or dates or ne thing normal of a teenager? or mayb i'm just overreacting..... who knows? not me.... i'm hopeless and confused.
